cat.lump.aq.textextraction.wikipedia.categories

Class Xecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.aq.textextraction.wikipedia.categories.Xecutor

  • public class Xecutor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class intends to join together all the necessary process to extract the articles related to a given category. It covers from the extraction of the vocabulary up to the storage of the relevant articles.
    Author:
    albarron, cristina
